Text.Page:
, we had some of our goods disappear during a routine delivery. Our agent responsible has been...disciplined, let's say, and we recovered the missing package.

That's where you come in. Deliver this to Jerelyn as soon as you can, and reassure her that the shipping problem has been "dealt with."
How may I help you?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"This is from Ebbra."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I was upset when it didn't arrive, and...what's that? "Dealt with?"

Oh, I see. None of my business, really, but that's reassuring.
